meta.content: Website for North Muskegon Public Schools

div.div: More Links

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

p.em: “We are an Educational Community that gives our BEST and expects the BEST.”

div.p: The mission of North Muskegon Public Schools is to assist all students in becoming lifelong learners, with the social skills necessary to become productive, responsible citizens of strong character.

ul.li: Have any questions reguarding the COVID -19 or for the school during the shutdown? Submit them here
Here is a compiled list of Educational Online Resources (This list will continue to grow)
Need help with a device? Please submit a ticket on this form and a member from our Technology Department will reach out to you.

div.span: We're asking all families whose income has changed to complete a NEW free and reduced meal application

NMPS is offering weekly Grab and Go breakfast and lunch free meals on Wednesday's starting Wednesday, April 22 from 10a-12p on Moulton across from the playground. Cars will travel West to East on Moulton for curbside pick up to ensure social distancing.

div.p: We believe that the purpose of NMPS is to create students who:
We believe that the stakeholders of the district will:

ul.li: Expect high standards for all students
Work in tandem with families, teachers and the community
Create a safe and nurturing environment for all
Assist all students in reaching their maximum potential
Enhance facilities to support achievement, athletics, and the arts

p.em: “We are an Educational Community that gives our BEST and expects the BEST.”
